title: Furnished 3 bedroom home in Oakland Hills
posting_body: This fully furnished home is located in the desirable Thornhill neighborhood, known for one of the best elementary schools in Oakland.
There are steep stairs leading up to the home from the garage but it’s worth the walk up.
You’ll be greeted to a peaceful home with beautiful views across the wooded canyon.
It’s adjacent to Sibley Regional Park and you’re minutes from Montclair Village.
The living room has a gorgeous deck, half bath and kitchen with large pantry and luxury appliances along with a gas fireplace.
All the skylights are solar powered and 3 of them have remote controls to open and close them.
It is a Lennox Brand Smart home and features doubled panes windows and AC.
The home features a top level master suite with a full bathroom (shower only), patio off the back, gas fireplace and carpeting.
The 2nd level has 2 bedrooms , one perfect for an office and 1 full bathroom.
- Amazing privacy and quiet, beautiful views across the nearby wooded canyon
- New Marvin double-glazed windows and doors
- Sit/stand desk and Aeron chair for home office setup
- Large deck with Weber propane grill

- Minimum 6 month lease term - Security deposit: 2x of a months rent - Delivered furnished - Water/sewer, garbage removal, and monthly cleaning service included with rent - Non-smoking unit - Pets will be considered on an individual basis, additional deposit required - 2 parking spaces in private detached garage included with rent - 6522 Heather Ridge Way, Oakland, CA 94611 is exclusively presented by ReLISTO, representing local landlords to lease and manage their residential apartments, condominiums, and homes.
